 [TARGETLANGUAGE] ENGLISH
[PROMPT]Objective: Create a comprehensive, SEO-optimized article (approximately 5,000 words) on the topic of "[Insert Article Title Here]" specifically targeting "[Target Audience - e.g., Beginners, Professionals, Business Owners]".

Content Requirements:

Engaging & Informative: Captivate readers with a compelling narrative, providing valuable insights and actionable advice.
Target Audience Focus: Tailor the information to the specific needs and interests of the designated target audience.
Clear & Structured: Utilize H1, H2, and H3 headings for improved readability and keyword visibility.
Comprehensive Coverage:
Introduction:
Engaging hook to capture attention.
Clear explanation of topic importance for the target audience.
Identification of key challenges or opportunities.
Content Body:
In-depth background and context.
Core aspects: benefits, challenges, tools, techniques.
Actionable insights or step-by-step guides (bullet points/numbered lists encouraged).
Data-backed claims with statistics, research, or real-world examples.
Advanced Tips:
Expert recommendations, strategies, or successful implementation examples.
Actionable advice readers can easily implement.
SEO Optimization:
Meta Description: Concise (under 160 characters), including primary keyword, enticing click-through.
Keyword Integration: Natural and strategic use of:
Primary Keyword: Title, headings, body, image alt text, meta description.
Secondary Keywords: Relevant keywords and LSI keywords for broader reach.
Internal & External Links:
Relevant internal links to other pages on the website.
High-quality, authoritative external links for credibility and context.
Writing Style:

Engaging & Informative: Blend formal and conversational tones for reader interest.
Readability:
Easy to scan with clear headings, subheadings, bullet points, and short paragraphs.
Visuals (images, infographics, videos) to enhance engagement.
Concise and easy-to-understand language.
Deliverables:

The completed article, formatted for easy reading and SEO implementation.
Key Enhancements:

Clear Objectives: Explicitly states the desired outcome (comprehensive, SEO-optimized article).
Detailed Requirements: Provides a more granular breakdown of content expectations, ensuring the AI understands the specific needs.
Emphasis on Target Audience: Reinforces the importance of tailoring the content to the specific needs and interests of the target audience.
Stronger SEO Guidance: Provides more specific instructions on keyword integration and the importance of internal and external links.
Clear Deliverables: Explicitly states the expected output format.
PromptHint: Craft a compelling 5,000-word SEO-optimized article on [Article Title] for [Target Audience].  Focus on: Engaging narrative, valuable insights, clear headings (H1-H3), actionable tips, and data-backed claims. Include: Meta Description: Under 160 characters, summarizing the article and including the primary keyword. Internal & External Links: To enhance credibility and improve user experience. Optimize for: Readability, keyword density (primary, secondary, LSI), and visual appeal.
